rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry with natural light and plants in line with Vastu principles

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Cozy Bohemian living area with mixed textures, warm colors, and eclectic decor. Large window opening for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and minimalistic design, incorporating Vastu principles to face east for auspiciousness

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room, open plan layout promoting social interaction.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Intimate reading nook with bookshelves and comfortable seating; oriented in a calm corner per Vastu guidelines

rooms.name: Bathroom (Wet Area)
rooms.description: Functional bathroom placed away from the kitchen as per Vastu norms

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with bohemian decor, north-east oriented per Vastu principles for prosperity

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated room featuring acoustic optimization and a projector screen; designed as an entertainment haven

rooms.name: Studio Workspace
rooms.description: Multipurpose area for work or creative endeavors, with abundant natural light

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive open space with seating areas, garden elements and a small barbeque setup. South-east oriented for Vastu auspiciousness.
